Title: Kharibdyss
Legend: The Kharibdyss is a deep-sea abomination that inspires primal terror in its prey. These beasts are employed by the Scourge Privateers to shatter enemy formations, where upon the scattered and broken survivors are picked off by the cruel Corsairs.
Intro: A Kharibdyss is armed with Fanged Tentacles and a Spiked Tail.

Rules.Name: Crew
Rules.Rule: CREW: This unitâ€™s handlers are armed with Cruel Goads and Whips.

Rules.Name: Abyssal Howl
Rules.Fluff: These creatures let loose spine-chilling roars when they scent the blood of their prey.
Rules.Rule: Enemy units cannot receive the Rally and Inspiring Presence commands while they are within 12" of this unit.
